languages.text: "Однако вопрос остается открытым! Деньги — есть, наследника — нет. Как поступить с наследством?"
"Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"
languages.original_text: "Однако вопрос остается открытым! Деньги — есть, наследника — нет. Как поступить с наследством?"

traits.locale_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"
"Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"
"Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"
"Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"
"Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

languages.text: “但即便如此，也必须有人来做这个决定！钱在我们这里，但却没有继承人。这笔遗产该怎么处理？”
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: “但即便如此，也必须有人来做这个决定！钱在我们这里，但却没有继承人。这笔遗产该怎么处理？”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, ¡todavía queda tomar una decisión! Tenemos el dinero, pero no hay heredero. ¿Qué será de la herencia?».
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, ¡todavía queda tomar una decisión! Tenemos el dinero, pero no hay heredero. ¿Qué será de la herencia?».

languages.text: 「とはいえ、何かしらの決断は必要です！金はありますが相続人はいません。遺産はどなたに引き継げばよろしいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、何かしらの決断は必要です！金はありますが相続人はいません。遺産はどなたに引き継げばよろしいでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Trotzdem muss die Sache noch entschieden werden! Wir haben Geld, aber keinen Erben. Was soll mit der Erbschaft geschehen?"
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: "Trotzdem muss die Sache noch entschieden werden! Wir haben Geld, aber keinen Erben. Was soll mit der Erbschaft geschehen?"

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, il faut prendre une décision ! Nous avons de l'argent, mais pas d'héritier. Que devons-nous faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, il faut prendre une décision ! Nous avons de l'argent, mais pas d'héritier. Que devons-nous faire ? »

languages.text: "Yine de bir karar vermek zorundayız! Paramız var ama vârisimiz yok. Bu vasiyeti ne yapmak lazım?"
languages.original_text: "Still, the decision is yet to be made! We have money, but we have no heir. What is to be done about the inheritance?"

traits.locale_text: "Yine de bir karar vermek zorundayız! Paramız var ama vârisimiz yok. Bu vasiyeti ne yapmak lazım?"
